snippet.title: Space Beam - (1979) - Arcade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Irem © 1979
[Coin-Op] Arcade Video Game
Emulator: MAME 0.215

This is a simple concept, but well executed.  Tension and strategy, and a decent computer AI to play against.  You go head-to-head at opposite ends of the play field.  You have to wait for your laser to charge up for it to reach all the way across to your opponent. Shoot a little too soon, and your laser dies short of its target.  Same thing for the opponent, so you play cat & mouse to try to shoot them down, while avoiding the deadly beam hitting your gun.  

Little objects are flying across the playfield which you can blast out of your way, or use them to strategically hide behind and dart in & out of.  It's pretty cool.  A nice alternate from all the space invaders clones this year.
